N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, Appendices, app H-4

State Regulations
STATE OF NEW YORK
DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTION
ALBANY, NEW YORK
APPLICATION FOR STATE AID TO PROBATION
Pursuant to the provisions of Section 14-a of the Correction

Law, I, the undersigned, Clerk of the governing body of the County or City of
________, State of New York, HEREBY CERTIFY that on
(month, day, year)
the governing body of said County or City appropriated or
otherwise made available for the operation of the probation services the sum of
$ ________ for the purpose or purposes specified in the attached budget of
proposed expenditures for the ________ probation department. I FURTHER CERTIFY that said sum was appropriated or otherwise
made available for the period beginning ________, 19________ and ending
________, 19 ________; that it constitutes the entire amount required for the
purpose or purposes specified, and that the said governing body desires to and
hereby does make application for State aid reimbursement in the amount of $
________ to the County or City pursuant to the provisions of Section 14-a of
the Correction Law. It is understood that if this application is approved by the

New York State Department of Correction and undertaken, State aid can be
granted only on money expended by the sponsoring municipality in accordance
with the law of New York State and the rules and regulations of the Department
of Correction. It is further understood that facilities and services provided
shall be open to all regardless of race, creed or color. It is further understood that these probation services will be
operated in compliance with all laws and the Constitution of the State of New

York and all ordinances, rules, regulations, resolutions and codes of the
subdivi-sions, departments and commissions of the State, which may be pertinent
thereto. In accepting State aid the governing body of ________ County or

City hereby AGREES: (1)
to conform to
the attached budget as approved by the State Commissioner of

Correction. (2)
to abide by the
decision of the State Commissioner of Correction as to the propriety of all
expenditures. Dated at ________, N.Y., this ________ day of ________, 19________

of: governing body):::: County or City of............:: State Commissioner of Correction:________: Return to Division of Probation, State Department of

Correction, The Alfred E. Smith State Office Building, Albany, New

York
